**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This stout staff is made from gnarled hawthorn. When used as a weapon, a _staff of nature's vengeance_ permanently has the effects of [_shillelagh_](/Spells.aspx?ID=282). **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells, plus one casting of _shillelagh_. Staff of Nature's Vengeance **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
  • **1st** [_shocking grasp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [_spider sting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=300)
  • **2nd** [_flaming sphere_](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [_vomit swarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=726)
  • **3rd** [_earthbind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)
  • **4th** [_bestial curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=670), [_spike stones_](/Spells.aspx?ID=717)
Staff of Nature's Vengeance (Greater) **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [_control water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=51)
  • **6th** [_purple worm sting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=242), [_tangling creepers_](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)
Staff of Nature's Vengeance (Major) **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 24,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **7th** [_sunburst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=326), [_volcanic eruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=360)
  • **8th** [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95), [_punishing winds_](/Spells.aspx?ID=240)
name: Staff of Nature's Vengeance (Greater)
